statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT interaction_timestamp, user_preference FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_preference->>'theme' = 'dark';
SELECT interaction_type, user_id FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_details LIKE '%error%';
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'comment' ORDER BY user_id, interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_details LIKE '%important%' OR interaction_details LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, user_preference FROM user_interactions WHERE user_preference->>'language' = 'English' ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, favorite_sport FROM user_preferences WHERE favorite_sport IN ('basketball', 'soccer') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_enabled = true;

SELECT user_id, interaction_type, JSON_VALUE(interaction_data, '$.action') AS action FROM user_interactions WHERE JSON_VALUE(interaction_data, '$.action') IS NOT NULL ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, favorite_sport FROM user_preferences WHERE favorite_sport IN ('Football', 'Basketball') ORDER BY user_id, favorite_sport;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_data FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_data->>'status' = 'active' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, favorite_sport, notification_enabled FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_type) AS interaction_count FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM ARSportsGame WHERE game_score > 50 ORDER BY game_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id=1
SELECT game_id, game_type, game_score FROM ARSportsGame WHERE game_completed=true ORDER BY game_score DESC
SELECT u.user_id, u.interaction_type, p.preference_value FROM UserInteractions u JOIN UserPreferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT session_id, session_start_time, session_end_time FROM ar_game_sessions WHERE game_score > 100 ORDER BY session_end_time ASC;
SELECT favorite_sport, preferred_location FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT game_name, total_players, most_popular_sport FROM game_statistics WHERE total_players >= 500 ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT session_id, user_id, session_start_time, session_end_time FROM ar_game_sessions WHERE user_id = 5 AND game_score > 100 ORDER BY session_start_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, favorite_sport, preferred_location FROM user_preferences WHERE favorite_sport = 'football' AND preferred_location = 'beach';
SELECT game_id, game_name, total_players, most_popular_sport FROM game_statistics WHERE total_players > 1000 ORDER BY total_players DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_time FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, game_level FROM GameProgress WHERE last_checkpoint > '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.user_id, u.theme_preference, p.language_preference FROM UserPreferences u INNER JOIN UserPreferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme_preference, language_preference FROM UserPreferences WHERE language_preference = 'English';
SELECT object_id, object_name, object_category FROM AugmentedRealityObjects WHERE object_category = 'Furniture' ORDER BY object_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, game_level, last_checkpoint FROM GameProgress WHERE game_level > 5 ORDER BY game_level DESC, last_checkpoint ASC;
SELECT user_id, high_score, game_level FROM Leaderboard WHERE high_score > 1000 AND game_level = 10 ORDER BY high_score DESC;
